data.name: Pinball Arcade: Season Five Pro Pack
data.detailed_description:
Get all ELEVEN Season Five Pro pinball tables for the greatly discounted price of $39.99- that’s 60% off the price of buying them individually!

The Pro Version of a tables gives you access to the table Operator’s Menu (allowing you to change many factory default settings), the ability to move the ball around the table at will, a mode that lets you move the camera around the table, and tips on playing the table from IFPA pinball pros.

Tables Included: The Getaway: High Speed II™, F-14 Tomcat™, Mary Shelley's Frankenstein™, No Fear: Dangerous Sports™, Judge Dredd™, Fireball™, El Dorado™, Hurricane™, Rescue 911™, Last Action Hero®, TX-Sector™.
data.about_the_game:

The Pro Version of a tables gives you access to the table Operator’s Menu (allowing you to change many factory default settings), the ability to move the ball around the table at will, a mode that lets you move the camera around the table, and tips on playing the table from IFPA pinball pros.

data.short_description: The Season Five Pro Pack includes all of tables and extra content released from Table Pack 41 through Table Pack 50 for a greatly discounted price! This includes the pinball tables: The Getaway: High Speed II™, F-14 Tomcat™, Mary Shelley's Frankenstein™, No Fear: Dangerous Sports™, Judge Dredd™, Fireball™, El Dorado™, Hurricane™, Rescue...
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 ghz or better.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound capable card.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX Lion or Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
